Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch Features: 14k gold-plated brass 47mm double hunter case with a matching curb chainSkeleton dial with roman numerals17 jewel mechanical movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 5.1 x 4.6 x 1.5 inchesShipping Weight: 8 ouncesItem model number: 3575-GDomestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description A variety of features including gold plating, a jewel mechanical movement and a skeleton dial make this pocket watch a luxurious timepiece that is sure to be treasured for generations to come. It features Roman numerals and a curb chain so it is both easily accessible and a snap to keep secure while in your pocket. Matching curb chain. Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold plated. Brass finish. Acrylic dial cover. 1.85 in. Dia. Complete with double-sided, engravable cover and skeleton dial, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch 3575-G is an heirloom-quality timepiece with a contemporary edge. A 14K gold-plated brass case and matching curb chain look classic and elegant next to a crisp white outer dial, showcasing black-tone Roman numeral hour markers. A mineral glass crystal provides resistance against wear and tear, while 17-jewel mechanical movement ensures reliability and precision.
